definition: underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: She met Oberon attended by his train of fairy courtiers.
sentences.chinese: 她遇见奥布朗，后边还跟着仙宫的侍臣。

sentences.english: The shine from the enchanted house appears again.
sentences.chinese: 仙宫的光彩又一次降临，。

sentences.english: Mount Asgard, pictured here, and Thor Peak are dream destinations for rock climbers.
sentences.chinese: 图中的仙宫山和托尔峰是攀岩爱好者梦想的场地。

sentences.english: Crescent end of loess white teeth, who have made Sin Temple Road, also.
sentences.chinese: 蛾眉皓齿终黄土，谁道仙宫有使还。

definition: Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
Palace in the Moon (in folk tales)
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
palace of the Dragon King at the bottom of the Eastern Sea
